author: Austin American-Statesman, Jonathan Tilove, Austin American-Statesman
title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott eases some restrictions in fight against the coronavirus
description: Gov. Greg Abbott announced executive orders Friday that will ease some of the most severe restrictions imposed to combat the spread of COVID-19.
content:
President Trump and Coronavirus Task Force Response Coordinator Deborah Birx lay out their plan to reopen the United States in three phases.
USA TODAY
